Articles.Content: This contract pack was created by Whitecat106 and contains 391 new contracts for your career mode. The contracts will offer you a progression that mimics that of the human spaceflight history, launching such missions as the Vostok, MIR, Venera and the ISS. Definitely [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/123453](**worth a look** if you’re looking to learn more about human spaceflight history!
Ooooohhhh! I like the looks of this! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

I will definitely try this out. Looks like a great idea. Hopefully it's not too repetitive like the stock system...

[sCENE: KSC - Apollo 11 astronauts exiting isolation trailer - close up dialogue...]

NASA Chief Admin: "Neil, Buzz - Welcome back. Remember that flag planting thing you did a few weeks ago?"

Neil, Buzz: "Uh, yea - what about it?"

NASA Chief Admin: "Well, see... there's a whole group of subcontractors that want you to go back right away and do it for each of them individually."

Neil, Buzz: "?"

NASA Chief Admin: "Yes, we want you to return to the moon now and stay there. Just pop out from time-to-time and plant the flag. Heck just keep using the same one over and over - we don't care."

Neil, Buz: "OK sure. But when can we come home?"

NASA Chief Admin: "We'll get back to you on that. Oh, look! Bunt cake!!!"

Pete, Alan: "Bastages!"

EDIT: I've downloaded the mod and yes, it seems rather good. Looking forward to further exploring it.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-16T10:24:45Z" title="06/16/2015 10:24  AM" data-short="9 yr">June 16, 2015</time> by Wallygator**
Tell me why all I can think of looking at this great mod is, "NASA worm logo! Must download!"
